comment.author: 23446078@N00
comment._content: I was just listening to Nantucket Sleighride last night. What a coincidence. Heartbreaking story. I am thrilled to actually see the face of the man that was first mate on this ship that's always fascinated me.

comment.author: 92136528@N00
comment._content: what a track that is! bizarrely used as the soundtrack to UK political TV programme World in Action presented by Brian Walden; always remembering seeing this as a kid and thinking how incongruous the music seemed for the subject matter :)

comment.author: 23446078@N00
comment._content: Too true!! Yesterday on the history channel they actually had the story of the Essex, so that's three times now in one week my life has been touched in some way by this story. Amazing.
